version_description:
- Chat function upgrade
- Add languages
- Bugs fixed
- Performance improvement

- Fixed Facebook login error
- Added one language 
- Performance enhancement

- Add a full earning team list
- Resend failed chat function
- Added one language
- Bugs fixed
- Performance enhancement

Added new function of sending photos in the instant messenger
Added function of setting up pass code for payment
Added function of ping all inactive team members
Performance optimisation
Bugs fixed

Added new function of sending photos in the instant messenger
Added function of setting up pass code for payment
Added function of ping all inactive team members
Performance optimisation
Bugs fixed

- introduced Convertible Balance
- added new function of drawing LIBRA, the unlocking token, every 12 hours. 
- users who got a LIBRA can submit personal information for KYC to 3rd-party compliance company 
- activated wallet status for every users (both KYC-ed and non-KYC-ed). User can do P2P transfer now when you have Realized Balance in your wallet.

- introduced Convertible Balance
- added new function of drawing LIBRA, the unlocking token, every 12 hours. 
- users who got a LIBRA can submit personal information for KYC to 3rd-party compliance company 
- activated wallet status for every users (both KYC-ed and non-KYC-ed). User can do P2P transfer now when you have Realized Balance in your wallet.

Added Game Centre in the app and launched our first game Flappy Star. 
Performance optimisation
Bugs Fixed
